snippet: A trial that ended last week in Texas brought to light the deception behind the wave of restrictions threatening women’s access to safe and legal abortions.
abstract: Editorial contends that Texas trial to hear challenges to state's 2013 package of abortion restrictions has revealed deceptions and inaccuracies behind state's arguments in favor of them; says plaintiffs have presented compelling evidence that restrictions, particularly admitting-privileges rule and surgical center requirement, do nothing to protect women's health or safety.
lead_paragraph: A trial that ended last week in Texas brought to light the deception behind the wave of restrictions threatening women’s access to safe and legal abortions.
